Posts.EditableText: By 'add yours today' does that mean that others can have sections on your website for our own games?
Posts.HTML: By 'add yours today' does that mean that others can have sections on your website for our own games?

Posts.EditableText: it's a toplist.  You add your site, add the button to your website, people click that button, and your site moves to the top of the list depending on your vote count.
Posts.HTML: it's a toplist.  You add your site, add the button to your website, people click that button, and your site moves to the top of the list depending on your vote count.
